name: anjou
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of pear (= a sweet fruit that has a rounded base and is slightly pointed near the stem): Green Anjous don't change colour when they're ripe. The lamb was served with Anjou pears and shallots.
More examplesFewer examplesSome of these new varieties have a much nicer taste than the Anjou.The dessert that I enjoyed the most was the caramelized Anjou pear with chocolate.We dipped the red Anjou pears into the sweet cream.Her Anjou pear tart was beautifully presented.
